entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Snow level 1900 metres. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with a few showers. Snow level rising to 2300 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 12. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries near midnight and ending after midnight then clearing. Snow level 2300 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
